title: how to call predict function
body:
I was actually trying to call predict function on logistic regression but it says logistic regression has no function predict.
```py
disc_model.predict((train_cands_person[0], F_train_cands_person[0]))
```
--------------------------------error--------------------------------
```py
AttributeError: 'LogisticRegression' object has no attribute 'predict'
```

A code snippet will be fine with instructions.

---------------------------------model not converging------------------------------------
```py
print(F_train_cands_person[0].shape)
# (8060, 163462)
# Features = 163462
# candidates = 8060

disc_model = LogisticRegression()
%time disc_model.train((train_cands_person[0], F_train_cands_person[0]), train_marginals, n_epochs=50,batch_size=256, lr=0.0001)

[INFO] fonduer.learning.disc_learning - Load defalut parameters for Logistic Regression
[INFO] fonduer.learning.disc_learning - Settings: {'n_epochs': 50, 'lr': 0.0001, 'batch_size': 256, 'seed': 1234, 'host_device': 'CPU', 'bias': False, 'input_dim': 163462}
[INFO] fonduer.learning.disc_learning - [LogisticRegression] Training model
[INFO] fonduer.learning.disc_learning - [LogisticRegression] n_train=8060  #epochs=50  batch size=256
[INFO] fonduer.learning.disc_learning - [LogisticRegression] Epoch 1 (7.56s)	Average loss=0.693147
[INFO] fonduer.learning.disc_learning - [LogisticRegression] Epoch 5 (31.68s)	Average loss=0.693147
[INFO] fonduer.learning.disc_learning - [LogisticRegression] Epoch 10 (61.85s)	Average loss=0.693147
[INFO] fonduer.learning.disc_learning - [LogisticRegression] Epoch 15 (92.19s)	Average loss=0.693147
[INFO] fonduer.learning.disc_learning - [LogisticRegression] Epoch 20 (122.46s)	Average loss=0.693147
[INFO] fonduer.learning.disc_learning - [LogisticRegression] Epoch 25 (152.91s)	Average loss=0.693147
[INFO] fonduer.learning.disc_learning - [LogisticRegression] Epoch 30 (183.41s)	Average loss=0.693147
[INFO] fonduer.learning.disc_learning - [LogisticRegression] Epoch 35 (214.15s)	Average loss=0.693147
[INFO] fonduer.learning.disc_learning - [LogisticRegression] Epoch 40 (244.51s)	Average loss=0.693147
[INFO] fonduer.learning.disc_learning - [LogisticRegression] Epoch 45 (275.07s)	Average loss=0.693147
[INFO] fonduer.learning.disc_learning - [LogisticRegression] Epoch 50 (335.79s)	Average loss=0.693147
[INFO] fonduer.learning.disc_learning - [LogisticRegression] Training done (335.80s)
CPU times: user 5min 32s, sys: 2min 31s, total: 8min 4s
Wall time: 5min 35s
```
can you tell me the reason and solution for model not converging.....?

Thanks in advance
